traits.Amphibious: The bullywug can breathe air and water.
traits.Speak with Frogs and Toads: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.
traits.Standing Leap: The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.
traits.Swamp Camouflage: The bullywug has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

actions.Multiattack: The bullywug makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its spear.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Spear: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
